heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
footerText: Â© {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.

defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with 20%

allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past ceremonies.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team of professionals dedicated to your well-being and transformation, committed to holding a safe and supportive space.
editGuideDescription: Modify the details of this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the guide from the database.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred medicine used for centuries by indigenous tribes of the Amazon. It is a decoction of two plants, the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis), which together create a potent brew that opens the doors to perception and deep spiritual and emotional healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca induces altered states of consciousness that allow access to repressed memories, unconscious behavior patterns, and a direct connection with the spirit. It facilitates the release of emotional blockages, traumas, and fears, providing mental clarity and a renewed understanding of life's purpose.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher that guides each participant on a unique and personal journey. Its ancestral wisdom teaches about love, forgiveness, and the interconnectedness of all things, offering lessons that resonate long after the ceremony.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path, finding answers to deep questions and defining a clearer purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and negative patterns that hold you back. Ayahuasca helps you heal past wounds and cultivate self-love.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound sense of unity with the universe, nature, and your inner self. Rediscover your spiritual essence and your place in the world.
groupCeremonyDescription: A collective healing space where the group's energy enhances the individual experience. Ideal for sharing and learning in community.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific needs with the full attention of our guides.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the history, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the team dedicated to holding a safe and supportive space for your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find everything you need to know.
contactCommunityText: Become part of our community and stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies and events. Follow us on our social networks to connect with us.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is the foundation of a transformative experience. Follow these steps to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: Our ceremonies are structured to ensure a safe and profound experience. From preparation to integration, we accompany you every step of the way.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space guided by our experts, where music, silence, and medicine come together to facilitate your inner journey.
experienceProcessDescription: Every journey is unique. You may experience visions, emotional releases, and deep understandings about yourself and the universe.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you process and apply the lessons received in your daily life, ensuring a lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet prepares your body to receive the medicine. We recommend following it for at least one week before and after the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList:
- Fresh fruits and vegetables
- Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats)
- Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
- White fish and chicken (in moderation)
- Water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
- Red meats and pork
- Fried or processed foods
- Dairy and aged cheeses
- Refined sugars and spicy foods
- Caffeine and alcohol
mentalPrepSubtitle: Intention is the compass of your journey. Dedicate time to reflection and introspection before the ceremony.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and open yourself to the experience.
intentionsDescription: Define one or more clear intentions for your ceremony. What would you like to heal or understand?
reflectionDescription: Write in a journal your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel and release without judgment. Our guides are there to support you.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
comfortItemsList:
- Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
- Blanket and pillow
- Water bottle
essentialsList:
- Personal hygiene items
- Journal and pen
- Open mind and heart
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Sign in or register to access your personalized preparation guide.

authRequiredCoursesDescription: Sign in or register to access our preparation courses.

emailBodyPlaceholder: Write the content of your email here...

newTemplateMessageEN: Write your message in English here.

questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication?

assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user will participate in.
errorPositiveNumber: The '{{field}}' field must be a positive number.
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: It is crucial for your safety that we know your health status.
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Some medications can have dangerous interactions with Ayahuasca.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications, dosages, and the reason you are taking them.
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Honesty on this point is vital to ensure a safe environment for you and everyone.
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperienceDesc: This helps us understand your level of familiarity with the process.
questionnaireIntentionDesc: Your intention will guide your journey. Take a moment to reflect.
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I seek to heal a past wound, understand my purpose, connect with my spirituality...
pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step to continue.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
preparationCompleteDescription: Your questionnaire has been saved. You are now ready for the next step of your journey.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These are the answers you provided. If you need to change them, please contact a guide.
backupSubtitle: Manage application data by exporting or importing a full backup.
exportDataDescription: Create a JSON file with all application data (users, ceremonies, content, etc.).
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON file. This action will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will replace all current data with the content of the file. An automatic backup will be created before proceeding. Are you sure you want to continue?
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can use it to revert the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to revert to the version before the last import? This will overwrite the current data.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to its previous state.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all user conversations with the AI guide.
allConversationsDescription: Here you can view the chat history of all users.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor system errors to maintain application health.
systemLogsDescription: List of errors automatically captured by the system.
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete all error logs. It cannot be undone.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete this error log.
myChatsSubtitle: Continue your conversations with our spiritual guide.
myConversationsDescription: Here you can view your chat history and resume conversations.
noChatsFound: You haven't started any conversations yet.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I am here to help you on your healing path. How can I assist you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
aiGuideDescription: To help you prepare, you have access to a personal AI guide and a series of video courses.
aiGuideContent: The AI chat is trained on 'The Art of Healing' philosophy to answer your questions about the medicine, preparation, and process. The video courses will guide you step-by-step.
coursesDescription: These video courses are designed to guide you through the preparation process and answer common questions.
addCourseDescription: Create a new video course for users.
editCourseDescription: Modify the details of this course.
deleteCourseConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete this course.
noCoursesAvailable: No courses available at this time.
viewUserChatsDescription: Review the conversations this user has had with the AI guide.
